ruling: - Since [[Mystical Space Typhoon]] cannot destroy itself, when you chain [[Fiend's Hand Mirror]] to your opponent's [[Mystical Space Typhoon]], you cannot re-direct the [[Mystical Space Typhoon]] to target itself. But you can re-direct it to target and destroy [[Fiend's Hand Mirror]].

- When your opponent activates [[Mystical Space Typhoon]] to destroy his/her [[Mirage of Nightmare]], you can chain [[Fiend's Hand Mirror]] and have [[Mystical Space Typhoon]] destroy [[Fiend's Hand Mirror]] instead.
